reference.title: User Account
reference.shortdesc: CWRC provides an enriched user experience no matter what type of user account you have. Features include an insite messaging system between project members and a bookmarking tool to collection your favorite materials together.

section.title: General information
section.p: Users login to their accounts, by clicking on the Login icon at the top right corner of the CWRC webpage. This is where you access your account features - Dashboard, Research Space, Project Dashboards (for project editors and administrators), your user profile, and logout.

CWRC has divided user accounts into sections. The Dashboard is where you access the main features of your account. This is where you access your messages, workflow reports, saved searches, and bookmark lists. For more information see below.
You have a research space, this currently takes you to the CWRC collaboratory.
Logging out of CWRC takes you back to the CWRC homepage.

section.title: Dashboard
section.p: The features of your account dashboard have been previously mentioned, here we will outline everything your CWRC account has to offer.

Private Messages is where you can check and send messages to other CWRC members who belong to the same project(s) as you. This is where you will see new messages. If you click on the View all messages button located at the bottom of the message section it will take you to your account inbox.
